title: Xantoné Blacq Trio – Jazz-Funk Safari
description: Energetic journey through jazz and funk performed in trio format with a guest vocal performance. Xantoné Blacq is a musician with over 25 years of experience, known for collaborations with artists such as Amy Winehouse, Mark Ronson and Earth, Wind & Fire.

title: Emma Rawicz – Live in Szczecin
description: Concert of British saxophonist and composer Emma Rawicz with her band. Rawicz has performed at venues such as Ronnie Scott's, Berlin Philharmonic and Love Supreme Festival.

title: [TEST] Test New Year Concert
